talk.author: did:plc:vxwze54j3mi7apdkyxfotjt7
talk.utter: I don’t understand this thinking at all. You shouldn’t be interacting during the movie so what difference does it make that you’re alone? People are weird.

talk.author: did:plc:jurmbmkrztuvwtzvl46mcpwq
talk.utter: For me it’s an important non-speaking social activity. I don’t judge anybody else for watching movies alone, but the emotional reaction of people around me + discussion afterward is an integral part of my movie theater experience.

talk.author: did:plc:vxwze54j3mi7apdkyxfotjt7
talk.utter: I think seeing a movie in a theater with lots of people in it is fun, but I usually need to digest a film a bit before I can talk about it properly

talk.author: did:plc:vxwze54j3mi7apdkyxfotjt7
talk.utter: I don’t understand this thinking at all. You shouldn’t be interacting during the movie so what difference does it make that you’re alone? People are weird.

talk.author: did:plc:iuhdyl3dws3ibsxyclelqd3b
talk.utter: I went BACK to see The Piano alone because first time friends kept interjecting.....
